publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3412 Mr Andrew Arbuckle: Burmaâ€”That the Parliament condemns the illegal government of Burma in its widespread abuse of human rights; calls on the relevant institutions, including the UN Security Council, to act to stop the terror of the Burmese Government; further condemns the overthrow of the previous democratically elected government of Aung San Suu Kyi, and recognises the brutality inflicted on ethnic groups, the use of forced labour and child soldiers and the huge numbers of refugees created as a result of the actions of this regime. Supported by: Frances Curran*, Mark Ballard*, Shiona Baird*, Stewart Stevenson*
S2M-3412 Burma (lodged on 12 October 2005) Murdo Fraser*, Euan Robson*, Robin Harper*, Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Chris Ballance*, Nora Radcliffe*, Eleanor Scott*
S2M-3412 Burma (lodged on 12 October 2005) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-3412 Burma (lodged on 12 October 2005) Roseanna Cunningham*
S2M-3412 Burma (lodged on 12 October 2005) Elaine Smith*
